create.title: Create Agent Strategy
create.description: Configure an AI agent-driven trading strategy
create.name: Agent Name
create.noAccountsHint: Add an exchange account first in the Accounts section
create.symbolsHint: Comma-separated list of symbols to trade (e.g., BTC, ETH, SOL)
create.promptPlaceholder: Describe your trading strategy in natural language. For example: Focus on BTC trend following. Enter long when price breaks above 20-day high with increasing volume. Use 2% stop loss and 5% take profit...
create.promptHint: The AI will follow these instructions to make trading decisions. Markdown formatting supported.
create.addModelLink: Add a model in Model Management

agents.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this agent?

newPage.basicInfoDesc: Set up your agent's identity and trading account
newPage.tradingConfigDesc: Define how your AI agent should trade
newPage.riskSettingsDesc: Set hard limits that the AI will never exceed
newPage.tipSpecificDesc: Describe entry/exit conditions, timeframes, and indicators clearly.
newPage.tipRiskDesc: Include stop-loss percentages and take-profit targets.
newPage.tipConditionsDesc: Specify when to trade and when to stay out of the market.
newPage.examplePromptText: Focus on BTC trend following. Enter long when price breaks above 20-day high with increasing volume. Use 2% stop loss and 5% take profit. Avoid trading during low volatility periods.
newPage.riskWarningDesc: Start with testnet and conservative settings.
newPage.errorNoSymbols: At least one symbol is required
newPage.errorNoPrompt: Please enter a prompt or open the Preview tab to generate one
newPage.errorShortPrompt: Trading prompt must be at least 10 characters

editPage.tradingConfigDesc: Update how your AI agent should trade
editPage.riskSettingsDesc: Update hard limits that the AI will never exceed
editPage.accountNote: Account cannot be changed after creation
editPage.changeWarningDesc: Any changes will be applied to the next trading decision.
editPage.errorShortPrompt: Trading prompt must be at least 10 characters

security.title: Security First
security.description: All API credentials are encrypted end-to-end. We recommend using sub-accounts with limited permissions and IP whitelisting.

info.title: Exchange Account Connection
info.description: Connect Hyperliquid, Binance, Bybit, OKX and more. Credentials are encrypted; use testnet to try without real funds.

dialog.description: Your API credentials are encrypted before storage

newPage.basicInfoDesc: Set up your account name and exchange
newPage.securitySubtitle: Learn how we protect your credentials
newPage.tipTestnetDesc: Use testnet mode to familiarize yourself with the platform without risking real funds.
newPage.tipSubaccountDesc: For CEX, create a sub-account with limited permissions for better security.
newPage.tipWhitelistDesc: Enable IP whitelist on your exchange for additional protection.
newPage.hyperliquidInfo: Hyperliquid is a decentralized perpetual exchange. You can import your wallet using a private key or seed phrase.
newPage.cexInfo: Generate API credentials from your exchange settings. Make sure to enable trading permissions but disable withdrawal.
newPage.connectionFailed: Account created, but connection test failed. Please check your credentials

dialog.title: Add New Provider
dialog.presetHint: Select a preset provider or customize
dialog.baseUrlHint: Enter the API endpoint URL, do not end with slash
dialog.apiFormatHint: Select the provider API input format

newPage.configurationDesc: Configure the provider details and API credentials
newPage.tipApiKeyDesc: Your API key is encrypted and stored securely. Never share your API key with others.
newPage.tipFormatDesc: Most providers use OpenAI-compatible format. Check your provider's documentation if unsure.
newPage.tipTestDesc: After adding a provider, use the test connection feature to verify your configuration.
newPage.advancedSettingsDesc: Custom endpoint configuration for self-hosted or proxy services
newPage.securityDesc: All API keys are encrypted using AES-256 before storage. Your credentials are never logged or exposed.

modelList.title: Available Models
modelList.empty: No models available for this provider

testError.no_api_key: No API key configured. Add and enable an API key for this provider under Models / Providers.
testError.no_base_url: Custom model requires a Base URL. Set the API endpoint in the provider configuration.
testError.connection_error: Cannot reach the service. Check network, proxy, or that the endpoint is reachable.
testError.auth_error: API key is invalid or expired. Please check and update your key.
testError.model_not_found: This model does not exist on the provider. Verify the model ID against the provider's supported models.
testError.rate_limit: Rate limited or too many requests. Please try again later.
testError.api_error: API returned an error. See details or try again later.
testError.unknown: Connection test failed. Check your configuration and try again.

ema.description: Trend-following indicator that gives more weight to recent prices

rsi.description: Momentum oscillator measuring speed and change of price movements

macd.title: MACD

riskControls.title: Risk Controls
riskControls.description: Set hard limits that the AI will never exceed
riskControls.maxLeverageTooltip: Maximum leverage the AI can use for any position
riskControls.maxPositionRatioTooltip: Maximum size of a single position as percentage of equity
riskControls.maxTotalExposureTooltip: Maximum total exposure across all positions
riskControls.minRiskRewardTooltip: Minimum risk-to-reward ratio required for trades
riskControls.maxDrawdownTooltip: Trading pauses if drawdown exceeds this threshold
riskControls.minConfidenceTooltip: Trades below this confidence level will be skipped
riskControls.highRiskWarning: Your current settings indicate high risk. Consider reducing leverage and position sizes.
riskControls.modeMismatchConservative: Risk settings are more aggressive than typical for Conservative mode.
riskControls.modeMismatchAggressive: Risk settings are more conservative than typical for Aggressive mode.
riskControls.modeMismatchBalanced: Risk settings are outside the typical range for Balanced mode.
riskControls.presetMismatch: Current risk settings deviate from the selected preset ({preset}): {details}. Ignore if intentional.

capitalAllocation.title: Capital Allocation
capitalAllocation.description: Assign a dedicated capital budget to this strategy to prevent interference between strategies
capitalAllocation.percentAmountTooltip: Percentage of account equity, e.g. 30% means using 30% of account funds
capitalAllocation.warning: Account capital allocation exceeds safe threshold. New positions will be blocked

promptEditor.title: Prompt Builder
promptEditor.description: Customize the AI's trading behavior and decision process
promptEditor.customPromptPlaceholder: Describe your trading strategy in natural language. Be specific about entry/exit conditions, risk management, and market conditions...
promptEditor.customPromptHint: This is appended to the system prompt. Be specific about your trading style and preferences.

placeholders.roleDefinition: Define the AI's role and expertise...

hints.roleDefinition: Leave empty to use default role definition
hints.tradingFrequency: Leave empty to use default frequency guidelines
hints.entryStandards: Leave empty to use default entry standards
hints.decisionProcess: Leave empty to use default decision process

promptEditor.conflictWithConservative: Your custom instructions may conflict with the current Conservative trading mode. The system will follow the trading mode first.
promptEditor.conflictWithAggressive: Your custom instructions may conflict with the current Aggressive trading mode. The system will follow the trading mode first.
promptEditor.conflictWithBalanced: Your custom instructions may conflict with the current Balanced mode. The system will follow the trading mode first.
promptEditor.suggestTradingModeConservative: Conservative template applied. Consider switching the trading mode above to Conservative for consistency.
promptEditor.suggestTradingModeMomentum: Momentum template applied. For more active trading, consider switching the trading mode to Moderate or Aggressive.

preview.title: Prompt Preview
preview.description: Preview the complete system prompt that will be sent to the AI
preview.testHint: Test with mock market data to see how the AI would respond

debate.title: Multi-Model Debate
debate.description: Let multiple AI models analyze and debate to reach consensus
debate.enableDescription: Multiple AI models will analyze the market in parallel and vote on decisions
debate.selectModelsDescription: Choose 2-5 AI models to participate in the debate
debate.minModelsWarning: At least 2 models are required for debate mode
debate.addModelLink: Add a model in Model Management
debate.minParticipantsDescription: Minimum number of models that must respond successfully for a valid debate

quantStrategies.title: Quant Strategies
quantStrategies.subtitle: Create and manage traditional quantitative trading strategies
quantStrategies.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this strategy?

info.title: Traditional Quant Strategies
info.description: Rule-based automated trading: Grid, DCA, and RSI strategies execute deterministic trading logic without AI.

typeDescriptions.grid: Profit from market volatility by creating a grid of buy/sell orders within a price range.
typeDescriptions.dca: Dollar-cost average into a position with scheduled orders, and sell when take-profit is reached.
typeDescriptions.rsi: Trade based on RSI indicator values — buy when oversold, sell when overbought.

strategyPreset.title: Strategy Style
strategyPreset.description: Choose your investment style and time horizon to auto-fill all parameters

riskProfile.title: Investment Style
riskProfile.conservativeDesc: Low leverage, small positions, high confidence threshold
riskProfile.balancedDesc: Moderate parameters, suitable for most users
riskProfile.aggressiveDesc: High leverage, large positions, lower confidence threshold

timeHorizon.title: Time Horizon
timeHorizon.swingDesc: 15m/1h/4h intraday to multi-day, ride the trend
timeHorizon.positionDesc: 4h/1d hold for weeks, capture major trends

strategyPreset.customDesc: Skip presets, configure all parameters manually

hero.subtitle: Let our multi-model AI debate engine optimize your alpha and execute across all major hubs.

bento.sectionSubtitle: Your AI-powered edge for crypto markets

features.title: Core Capabilities
features.subtitle: Everything you need from strategy to execution

0.title: Natural Language AI Trading
0.description: Define strategies with plain language prompts. AI understands your intent and generates actionable trading decisions — no coding required.

1.title: Multi-Model Debate Engine
1.description: Multiple AI models analyze markets in parallel with 4 consensus modes: majority vote, highest confidence, weighted average, and unanimous agreement.

2.title: Multi-Exchange Unified Access
2.description: Seamlessly connect to Binance, Bybit, OKX, and Hyperliquid through a single unified interface. Manage all accounts in one place.

3.title: Quant Strategy Engine
3.description: Classic quantitative strategies including Grid Trading, DCA (Dollar-Cost Averaging), and RSI-based signals, fully configurable and automated.

4.title: Backtesting & Performance
4.description: Simulate strategies against historical data. Analyze with Sharpe, Sortino, max drawdown, win rate, and comprehensive performance metrics.

5.title: Real-time Monitoring
5.description: Live WebSocket updates for positions, decisions, and market data. Instant notifications via Telegram, Discord, and Email.

capabilities.title: Core Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: Everything you need from strategy to execution

models.title: AI Models
models.desc: 8 providers with multi-model debate consensus engine

exchanges.title: Exchanges
exchanges.desc: Unified access to top crypto derivatives exchanges

strategies.title: Strategy Types
strategies.desc: From classic quant to AI-driven strategies

cta.subtitle: AI Trading, Multi-Exchange, Backtesting - One Click Away
